title: New: SKYWLKR – Like 3 Joints Or So EP
content:
SKYWLKR is the man behind Danny Brown, the guy at the back who doesn’t want any attention, but is integral to the whole thing. His work on last year’s XXX, namely ‘Die Like A Rockstar’ and ’30′, was rooted in Detroit’s industrial, electronic history, while also exploring the grotesque and woozy sounds of something more like D-12.  Following the release of Impressions mixtape earlier this year, SKYWLKR has dropped 3 more instrumentals, this time from Danny Brown and Childish Gambino cuts. It becomes in interesting insight into how he views hip-hop.

Stream the whole thing below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
